1251670.name: Divinoids
1251670.description:
Pilot one of several unique Divinoids, alien mecha that change back and forth between God and Mythical Beast forms. Destroy human armies, demolish their cities and conquer their planets. Up to four players co-op.

  • Travel through procedurally generated galactic sectors; land on planets to explore and conquer.
  • Highly destroyable everything; climb and destroy buildings, cities and giant bosses piece by piece.
  • Each Divinoid is entirely unique; no shared moves or even climb mechanics.
  • Shapeshift between unique God and Mythical Beast forms to handle any situation.
  • Equip weapons and passive modules for deep customization and replayability.
  • Eject from your Divinoid when it's destroyed, and keep fighting on foot.
  • Grab a submarine and throw it at a helicopter!
1251670.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
